S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-331 This patch fixes a look-ahead problem in the parser: In the method DB2DefaultOption, the look-ahead for miscBuiltins is too liberal: it mistakenly thinks it has found a builtin in this case. I made the look-ahead more specific by adding a check against comma.
Contributed by Dag H. Wanvik <Dag.Wanvik@Sun.COM>
